Your friends from your Address Book will be countinuously synced so you can see who you already know on Tribe.

Only you can add friends outside your address book. Nobody can add you.

We love interacting with our users on Twitter
We reply in less than 48 hours to every single email.

Use your phone number to connect
By registering, I agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
We just texted a code for you to verify.
Haven\'t received the code? Tap to resend!
Usernames may include letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
Discover which of your\nfriends are already here.
We send your contacts to the server to connect you\nwith friends. Check out our Terms & Privacy for details.
You need at least one friend\nto enter. Send invites! :dizzy:
We are about to send a code\nto verify this phone number.
Sounds like the code didn\'t\nget through to your phone.
Our Support team has been notified and will help you shortly. Until then, feel free to try to resend your code.
Make sure you don’t enter Tribe alone!
Would you like to start with your friends already on Tribe?
Start a revolutionary group messaging experience with your best friends!
Try with friends, teammates, classmates, roommates, work teams and long distance relationships.
By continuing, I agree that I have permission to\ninvite my contacts. See Terms & Privacy Policy

A pending message. Swipe to resend :arrow_left:
Snoozed message from %1$s available again. Catch up!
I was able to get access to Tribe. Just noticed that you already have %1$d friends on this app. I can get you in: %2$s #JoinTheTribe
Here is your invite to join the %1$s group on Tribe. %2$s #JoinTheTribe
Here is your invite to join the %1$s group on Tribe. Join quickly because this invite will expire in %2$s ! %3$s #JoinTheTribe
Get on this so we can chat http://get.tribe.pm/start1 :joy:
I have %1$s points on Tribe %2$s. Try to beat me on http://tribe.pm #JoinTheTribe
I just discovered Tribe, but I can’t enter alone. Come now so we can get access together. Waiting for you. Go on %1$s #JoinTheTribe
